feat: add passcode detection and Option C 2-tier progress UI

- Passcode detection: 5s timer after backup starts, emits waiting-for-passcode
  event when no file progress detected, passcode-entered when transfer begins
- SyncProgress.tsx: 2-tier display with getPhaseTitle() (title+context) and
  progress.message (dynamic backend details)
- Amber warning box during passcode wait with detailed instructions
- IPC events: onWaitingForPasscode, onPasscodeEntered in preload + hook
- AppModals integration: iPhone sync modal with proper wrapper
- Added missing IgnoredCommunication types and ignored_communications table
- BACKLOG items 022-030 added for future improvements
- BACKLOG-030 (Critical): Message parser async yielding deferred

Tested with 627k messages, 1k contacts - sync completes successfully.
Known: ~60s UI freeze during parsing (tracked in BACKLOG-030).
